articles.title: How to clean air fryers fast without scrubbing or soaking them
articles.author: Angela Patrone
articles.summary: Astonish has introduced the Astonish Specialist Air Fryer Cleaner, a product designed for easy and fast cleaning of air fryers. According to cleaning influencer @cleaningwithdanielled, the cleaner effectively breaks down burnt-on stains and grease without the need for soaking or scrubbing, making it a convenient solution for air fryer maintenance.

articles.title: The 60 Best Things We Found Under $30 On Amazon
articles.summary: Amazon offers Sunco LED Camping Lamp with 360-degree lighting and wide-range dimming, charged via US-C cable. LISEN introduced Retractable Car Charger with retractable cables compatible with a range of tech and additional ports. medicube launches Salmon DNA PDRN Capsule Cream infused with collagen and hyaluronic acid.

articles.title: Kennedy plans to phase out 8 commonly used food dyes
org: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences
articles.summary: Chipotle Mexican Grill Inc. plans to launch restaurants in Mexico by early 2026 in partnership with Alsea SAB. CATL (Contemporary Amperex Technology Company Ltd.) announced technological advances in EV batteries, making them cheaper, lighter, faster to recharge, and more resistant to cold, which are expected to be widely available in new cars in a couple of years.

articles.title: I tested the Ninja Creami, TikTok's favorite ice cream maker, to see if it lives up to the hype
articles.author: James Brains
articles.summary: Ninja has introduced the Ninja Creami, an ice cream maker that allows users to create custom frozen treats with dietary restrictions. The product requires a 24-hour freezing period. Ninja also launched the Ninja Swirl, which builds on the Creami's technology and adds the ability to make soft-serve ice cream. Furthermore, there is the Ninja Creami Deluxe which has a more powerful motor, larger tubs and more programs.

articles.title: Dreame's New Z1 Series Makes Your Pool a Summer Oasis
articles.author: CNET Brand X
articles.summary: Dreame Technology has launched the Z1 Pro and Z1 Robotic Pool Cleaners, featuring intelligent automation and powerful suction for effortless pool cleaning. These cordless cleaners, first unveiled at CES 2025, offer 8,000GPH suction power to remove dirt, leaves, and algae. A 15% discount is available until April 30 using specific codes on Dreame's website and Amazon.

articles.title: Grand opening celebration planned for The Fresh Market in Mount Pleasant May 3
articles.author: Perrin Moore
articles.summary: The Fresh Market is opening a new grocery store in Mount Pleasant on April 30th, with a grand opening celebration planned for May 3rd. The event includes freebies, giveaways, a bread-breaking ceremony, discounts for loyalty program members, and the sampling of an 80-pound Parmesan cheese wheel.

articles.title: Self-service laundry chain expands in Brunei
articles.summary: myDobi, a Malaysian self-service laundry chain, launched its 14th outlet in Sengkurong, Brunei. The new outlet features six washing machines and 10 dryers, offering free washes with halal-certified detergent, sanitizer, and softener until April 25. myDobi is also planning to open five more outlets in the country.

articles.title: Kaltura Recognized in the 2025 Gartner® Market Guide for Video Platform Services  Apr. 21, 2025 20:00
articles.summary: Kaltura has launched new AI-powered agents including Kaltura Work Genie, Kaltura Class Genie, and Kaltura TV Genie. They also launched Kaltura AI Content Lab which enables content creators to quickly transform content into engaging, bite-sized experiences, generating clips, video quizzes, summaries, and chapters from videos and audio.

articles.title: 4 ways Windows Phone Link makes my life way easier
articles.author: John Kanellakos
articles.summary: Microsoft's Phone Link is a Windows 11 app that syncs mobile phone data with PCs, offering access to messages, photos, and notifications.  Recent updates include features like file access via File Explorer and instant photo notifications, streamlining workflows by allowing users to manage phone tasks directly from their computer.

articles.title: Hyundai launches all-new Elantra with N Line and hybrid variants
articles.author: The Manila Times
articles.summary: Hyundai Motor Philippines Inc. (HMPH) launched the all-new Elantra at the 20th Manila International Auto Show. The launch signifies Hyundai's commitment to innovation and electrification, aiming to deliver vehicles that enrich customer's lives through hybrid technology.

articles.title: Opening date set for new Aldi store in Genesee County
articles.author: Fuad Shalhout
articles.summary: Aldi is set to open a new store in Davison Township on May 8 at 7480 East Court Street. The grand opening includes a ribbon-cutting ceremony, giveaways for the first 100 customers, and a chance to win a $500 Aldi gift card. A soft opening will be held on May 7 for early access to the store.

articles.title: I'm a Ninja Creami Swirl Convert
articles.author: Lauren Ro
articles.summary: Ninja is launching the Ninja Swirl by Creami, an upgraded ice-cream maker that turns frozen mixtures into soft serve. The new product allows users to create various frozen treats, including soft serve and frozen yogurt, at home with customizable recipes and ingredients. The Ninja Swirl includes an extractor that turns the ice cream into soft serve.

articles.title: Hyundai launches 2025 Tucson Hybrid in Pakistan with two variants
articles.author: News Desk
articles.summary: Hyundai Nishat has launched the 2025 Tucson Hybrid in Pakistan, offering two variants: the Hybrid Smart (FWD) and the Hybrid Signature (AWD). The hybrid SUV features a 1.6-litre turbocharged GDI engine, delivering a combined 230 PS and 367 Nm of torque, with prices starting at Rs10,999,000.

articles.title: Dragon Ball DAIMA characters come to Sparking! Zero this week
articles.author: Shacknews
articles.summary: Dragon Ball is releasing new character versions from its latest adventures as DLC (Downloadable Content) this week for Sparking! Zero. This expands the available content within the game.

articles.title: Test-Driving The 2025 KGM Actyon
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: SsangYong rebranded their product as KGM Actyon. The article reviews and provides information about the quality of the newly rebranded product.

articles.title: Hot Buy – 25% Off on 16″ Dell Inspiron Touchscreen Laptop with Core i7, 16GB RAM
articles.author: Jessica Fritsch
articles.summary: Dell is offering a deal on its Inspiron 16 Touchscreen Laptop, featuring an Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB RAM, and a 1TB SSD. The laptop boasts a 16-inch, 2.5K resolution screen, ComfortView Plus, a backlit keyboard, and multiple ports, including USB Type-C. It includes Windows 11 Home and trials of Microsoft 365 and McAfee+ Premium.

articles.title: Over 900 five-star reviews can't be wrong about this popular UGG boot — and it's in stock in every color for now
articles.author: Dawn Magyar
articles.summary: UGG's Classic Ultra Mini Platform Boot, priced at $160, is receiving positive feedback for its comfort, style, and fit, with customers expressing strong satisfaction and purchasing multiple colors. The boot features a suede outer and UGGplush lining, and is currently in stock in four colors: Sand, Chestnut, Black, and Driftwood.

articles.title: This Powerful Cordless Vacuum Is A True ‘Back Saver' And Under $90 Right Now
articles.author: Kevin Cortez
articles.summary: A lightweight wireless stick vacuum cleaner is available on sale. It features a powerful motor, anti-tangle roll head, 11-level filtration system, three suction modes, LED spotlights, an easy-open dustbin, and a digital display. User reviews highlight its ease of use, suction power, and effectiveness on various surfaces.

articles.title: Best washing machine under 20000 in 2025 for faster wash cycles, lower electricity bills: Top 10 washers
articles.author: Aishwarya Faraswal
articles.summary: Samsung is introducing its 8 kg fully automatic top load washing machine with Eco Bubble and Bubble Storm technology, along with a Digital Inverter Motor. LG offers a 7 kg fully automatic washing machine featuring a Smart Inverter Motor and TurboDrum. Whirlpool presents a 7 kg washing machine with Magic Clean and Smart Sensor technologies.

articles.title: This company soared as a ‘Trump trade.' Now it's set for an AI boost, say analysts.
articles.author: James Rogers
articles.summary: Phunware plans to launch an AI personal concierge for the hospitality industry and a new AI-driven software-development platform in mid-2025. Taglich Brothers analyst Howard Halpern wrote that Phunware has significant long-term growth potential as it transitions operations to the development and deployment of its next-generation generative AI SaaS platform.

articles.title: How AI Shopping Is Impacting and Transforming The Way We Shop Online
articles.summary: AI is significantly impacting e-commerce, leading to the introduction of personalized recommendations, smart search, virtual try-ons by companies like Lenskart and Nykaa, AI chatbots, and dynamic pricing strategies. Retailers like Amazon and Flipkart are using AI-driven fraud detection to enhance the safety and security of online transactions, improving the overall customer experience.

articles.title: B&M is selling a Dyson dupe that's perfect for summer that's a huge £310 cheaper ...
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: B&M is selling the Blaupunkt Bladeless Standing Fan for £39. This fan is presented as a cheaper alternative to a Dyson fan.

articles.title: Wendy's Introduces a New Chicken Sandwich & Lemonade
articles.author: Michael Carpenter
articles.summary: Wendy's has launched the Cajun Crunch Chicken Sandwich and Tangerine Twist Lemonade, available for a limited time at participating locations. These new menu items reflect Wendy's commitment to customer satisfaction and continuous innovation.

articles.title: OrangeOffer Enhances Deal Display Policy to Elevate User Experience
articles.summary: OrangeOffer.com has announced a major update to its promotional display policy. The update introduces enhancements to streamline how promotions are presented, prioritizing transparency and usability. These changes aim to improve user experience and provide easier access to high-quality deals.

articles.title: Fresh Express Unveils Bold New Visual Identity, Leading into the Next Era for the Iconic Salad Brand
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Fresh Express has unveiled a refreshed brand identity and redesigned packaging for its salads. The new look includes a modernized logo, updated packaging with enlarged product windows, and a cohesive color system, aiming to connect with a new generation of consumers. The updated visual identity will start appearing on shelves nationwide starting May 9, 2025, with activations to follow as part of the "Express Yourself" campaign.

articles.title: Gmarket to launch new promotional campaign 'All In'
articles.author: Rotc Story
articles.summary: Gmarket Inc. is launching a new promotional campaign called 'All In' in collaboration with Amorepacific Corp., spotlighting the brand's products on Gmarket's platform with exclusive offers and active advertising. Six exclusive products from Amorepacific brands, including Sulwhasoo and Illiyoon sets, will be offered only on Gmarket.

articles.title: The cordless Henry vacuum cleaner that out lasts Shark and Dyson now 37% off on Amazon
articles.author: Stephanie Colderick
articles.summary: The Henry Quick hen.100 cordless vacuum cleaner is currently available on Amazon for £189.05, which is a 37% reduction from its original price of £229.99. This cordless vacuum cleaner features a pod system for dust-free emptying and a detachable lithium-ion battery providing up to 60 minutes of cleaning time.

articles.title: Glossier has launched a new You Fleur fragrance and I was pleasantly surprised
articles.author: Maisie Bovingdon
articles.summary: In 2025, Glossier launched You Fleur, a new addition to their You fragrance line, described as a multi-layered skin-scent with notes of ylang ylang, apricot, and mineral salt.  The fragrance comes in a lilac bottle and is vegan and cruelty-free, designed to be a light, fresh, and wearable floral scent.

articles.title: Can Thunderbird Finally Compete With Gmail?
articles.author: Dan Mitchell
articles.summary: Thunderbird is relaunching with a complete redesign, mobile apps, and a new suite of services called Thunderbird Pro. These updates mark a significant expansion beyond its traditional desktop email focus.

articles.title: Introducing Vera Wang LOVE
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Vera Wang introduced Vera Wang LOVE, a modern fragrance extending their presence in the luxury fragrance sector. The fragrance is available at Ulta.com immediately and will be in select Ulta Beauty stores starting May 18, 2025.

articles.title: B&M is selling a Dyson dupe that's perfect for summer that's a huge £310 cheaper than the real thing
articles.author: Laura McGuire
articles.summary: B&M is selling a Blaupunkt Bladeless Standing Fan as a cheaper alternative to the Dyson model. The store is also offering a Tower air fryer for £25, significantly less than Ninja's 4.7L air fryer. Both products are available in B&M stores.

articles.title: Data-Driven Dose: How Consumer Health Brands Are Using AI to Serve Customers Better
articles.author: Ht Brand Studio
articles.summary: Sigmoid launched a GenAI-powered solution that enabled a medical technology company to streamline product marketing content creation, achieving 95% faster content creation and saving $1.3M annually. Also, an American consumer health company has launched a mobile app that allows consumers to scan their skin using smartphone cameras and receive personalized skincare advice.

articles.title: LG CNS highlights how mathematical optimization solves business challenges
articles.author: Ahn Sung-mi
articles.summary: LG CNS highlighted its marketing optimization platform, MOP, at a recent forum. Launched in May 2023, MOP utilizes mathematical optimization and AI to maximize advertisement efficiency for sellers. Since its launch, MOP has attracted over 2,000 corporate clients, facilitating ad spending exceeding 300 billion won.

articles.title: Next's new 'non-crease' £34 dress you can 'just throw in your case for holidays'
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Next has introduced a new 'non-crease' £34 textured maxi dress ideal for holidays, available in hot pink or khaki green and various sizes. The dress features a tie waist belt, short sleeves, and a side split. The article also references similar dresses from Marks & Spencer and Debenhams.

articles.title: Technics EAH-AZ100 Earbuds Review: Smaller Size, Better Sound
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: Technics has launched its latest flagship earbuds featuring enhanced sound quality and a slimmer, more stylish design. This new product offers improved features in a compact package.

articles.title: The Litter-Robot 4 offers a high-tech solution for cat owners tired of scooping
articles.summary: Whisker has launched the Litter-Robot 4, an automatic self-cleaning cat litter box priced at £749.  The product aims to eliminate manual scooping and control odors and can be controlled via a mobile app to monitor litter levels and track a cat's health indicators. The review suggests it's an investment for convenience, especially beneficial for multi-cat households.

articles.title: Amazon slashes price of 'best instant tan' that gives 'beautiful glow'
articles.author: Beth Mahoney Shopping Writer
articles.summary: Bondi Sands 200ml Self Fake Tanning Foam - Dark is currently on sale at Amazon for £11.66, reduced from £17.49. The product is described as a lightweight foam that provides a flawless, natural bronzed glow and is also available at Cult Beauty, Look Fantastic, and Boots.

articles.title: This Samsung Patent Could Be the Blueprint for Its First Rollable Phone
articles.author: Alexander Maxham
articles.summary: Samsung is developing a vertically expanding rollable smartphone with a dual-camera setup and a thick bottom bezel, based on a recent patent. The device transforms from a compact size to a full-sized screen. However, due to pricing and economic factors, the launch is unlikely this year.

articles.title: How to use Amazon's barcode scanner for shopping
articles.summary: Amazon's scanning app provides detailed product information, including pricing, availability, and customer reviews, upon successful item scanning. Users can directly add items to their cart or wish list through the app.

articles.title: Sauce Essentials Announces U.S. Northeast Expansion Plans for 2025
articles.summary: Sauce Essentials is expanding its premium cannabis vape lines, including Sauce Live Resin AIO Vape Bars & AIO Vape Classics, into New York, New Jersey, and Maryland. This expansion aims to provide accessible, premium cannabis products while maintaining high standards of product quality and safety, creating local jobs and partnerships.

articles.title: 37 Practical Products Under $25 That'll Improve Your Life This Spring
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: The article showcases the introduction of several new products and services from various companies. Olay launched its Super Serum Body Wash. Medicube released "Zero Pore" Pads for skincare. Catrice introduced the "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener. NYX launched the Lip IV Hydrating Gloss Serum. EOS released the Shea Butter Vanilla Cashmere body lotion.

articles.title: Lincoln Should Use Ford's Bronco Platform to Go After Lexus and Land Rover
articles.author: Cole Attisha
articles.summary: The article discusses a hypothetical Lincoln luxury off-road SUV based on the Ford Bronco, potentially using a detuned 3.0-liter EcoBoost V6 engine. The imagined SUV would combine Lincoln's luxury and comfort with Ford Bronco's off-road capability, targeting the Land Rover Defender and Lexus GX market segments with features like 30-way adjustable seats and a Revel Ultima sound system.

articles.title: McDonald's giving away free food - but there's a catch
articles.author: Paul McAuley
articles.summary: McDonald's is offering app-exclusive deals, including at least 50% off chicken selects and a free breakfast wrap with delivery, alongside a free cheeseburger for orders over £15. The company also announced the return of the Snack Wrap in 2025, a fan-favorite item discontinued due to operational challenges, but is now coming back due to customer demand.

articles.title: Nintendo faces trade war test with Switch 2 launch
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching its new console, the Switch 2, with a debut date of June 5 and a price tag of $449.99. The launch will test Nintendo's ability to manage its supply chain and maintain pricing in the face of potential trade tariffs, which could impact the product's success, especially among casual gamers.

articles.title: Switch 2's first commercial featuring Paul Rudd has a connection to classic SNES
articles.author: Anuj Bhatia
articles.summary: Nintendo's Switch 2, showcased in a commercial featuring Paul Rudd, includes updated Joy-Cons and a built-in camera. The console will be available for preorder starting April 24th at a price of $450.

articles.title: Unveiling the OPPO K13 5G: Overpowering Performance Meets Advanced Innovation
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: OPPO India has launched the OPPO K13 5G smartphone, powered by a Snapdragon 6 Gen 4 Mobile Platform and featuring a 7000mAh battery with 80W SuperVOOC charging. The phone includes VC cooling, a 120Hz AMOLED display, and is available in Icy Purple and Prism Black, starting at INR 17,999.

articles.title: Amazon's 'powerful' budget cordless vacuum dubbed 'superior to shark' amid £45 price slash
articles.author: Eilidh Farquhar
articles.summary: Ultenic's U16 Flex Cordless Vacuum Cleaner is now available on Amazon Prime with a discount of £45.  The vacuum cleaner features a bendable tube, multiple suction modes, a tangle-free brush, and a 60-minute battery life, catering to various floor types and hard-to-reach areas. Customer reviews on Amazon praise its power and efficiency in cleaning different surfaces and being value for money.

articles.title: Kenya: Hotpoint, LG Push Smart Laundry Tech to Grow Kenya's Laundromat Sector
articles.summary: Hotpoint Appliances, in partnership with LG Electronics, showcased LG's AI-powered commercial laundry systems at a recent seminar aimed at laundromat owners and aspiring investors. These systems optimize wash cycles, reduce water and energy consumption, and extend the lifespan of machines, targeting cost reduction, efficiency improvement, and eco-consciousness.

articles.title: Next shoppers calling £29 corduroy shacket their 'new favourite layer'
articles.author: Beth Mahoney
articles.summary: Next introduced the 'corduroy shacket' for £29, available in four colors. The shacket features practical front pockets, button fastenings, and an oversized fit, receiving an average customer score of 4.5 out of 5 stars.

articles.title: LG TVs' integrated ads get more personal with tech that analyzes viewer emotions
articles.author: Scharon Harding
articles.summary: LG TVs will soon feature an AI model to display advertisements tailored to viewers' personal beliefs and emotions. LG plans to integrate Zenapse's AI technology into its TV software (webOS) to interpret psychological factors and show emotionally impactful ads.

articles.title: 4 ways to cut AI clutter and reclaim your brainpower
articles.author: Brian Pittman
articles.summary: The article highlights several AI tools aimed at communicators and marketers. Pi (by Inflection AI) is presented as a conversational AI assistant for brainstorming. Perplexity AI combines an LLM with real-time web access. CopyAI is built to provide smart, tailored copy suggestions for marketing and communication materials. Other mentions include: Zoom's built-in AI recap, Otter.ai, Canary Mail or Superhuman's GPT, and GA4's AI answers

articles.title: Jeffs' Brands: Fort Submits Android Version of AI-Based Pest Control App to Google Play
articles.author: Jeffs' Brands Ltd
articles.summary: Jeffs' Brands' subsidiary, Fort Products Limited, has submitted the Android version of its AI-powered pest control mobile application for review on Google Play. The application identifies pests and recommends tailored treatments and Fort's proprietary pest control solutions.

articles.title: Simba and Wellington's team up for a bold tomato-flavoured chip explosion
articles.author: Masabata Mkwananzi
articles.summary: Simba, in collaboration with Wellington's, has launched a new tomato-flavored chip inspired by Wellington's full flavor Tomato Sauce. The new Simba Wellington's flavor is in response to social media requests from fans, all urging the brand to bring back the much-loved tomato sauce flavour.

articles.title: Young American Food Brands Acquires Best Provision Co., Expands into Cooked and Ready-to-Eat Meats
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Young American Food Brands acquired Best Provision to expand its product line. Young American intends to leverage Best Provision's expertise to enter new segments, such as smoked snacks and beef, and to develop better-for-you options like grass-fed cooked products, further enhancing its premium product lineup, including newly launched Wagyu sausages and brisket burgers.

articles.title: Olam Agri introduces Crown Thick Spaghetti: A delicious new twist on a classic favourite
articles.author: Guest Writer
articles.summary: Crown Flour Mill (CFM) Limited, a subsidiary of Olam Agri in Nigeria, launched Crown Thick Spaghetti on April 16, 2025, in Abuja. This new pasta product is designed to meet the demand for thicker spaghetti strands and is versatile for various sauces and local dishes, supported by Olam Agri's investments in local wheat farming.

articles.title: Andhra Pradesh Govt Launches 'Smart Street Project', Street Vendors To Get Modern Shops
articles.author: Parishmita Saikia
articles.summary: The Andhra Pradesh government is launching the 'Smart Street Project' to provide small traders with modern container shops, starting with a pilot in Nellore and expanding to other cities. These shops are equipped with modern amenities and the project includes training on food preparation, hygiene, marketing, and customer service. The initiative aims to transition small businesses from roadside trading to a sustainable, clean, and modern platform.

articles.title: Samsung to introduce local languages, AI to smart appliances in India
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Samsung is set to introduce AI-based commands in multiple Indian languages and roll out localized features to expand its footprint in the Indian appliances market. AI features, such as AI Energy, AI Wash, and AI VRT+ are now being extended to top-load washing machines, and the company is introducing customized cooling for air-conditioners based on local lifestyle research. The company is also enhancing customer service with a feature called 'Home Care Plus,' designed to detect and diagnose appliance issues proactively.

articles.title: AI-Powered Shampooing Machines Take Over Chinese Hair Salons
articles.author: Spooky
articles.summary: Hair salons in China are introducing AI-powered shampooing machines that wash and rinse clients' hair in 13 minutes. The machines use infrared sensors to detect the user's scalp and select the appropriate shampoo and shampooing method. The price for an AI-shampooing session started at 9.9 yuan ($1.35) and has increased to 19 yuan ($2.60) due to its popularity.

articles.title: Best quiet washing machine 2025: Top appliances that spin on near-silence
articles.author: Stuart Pritchard
articles.summary: Haier introduced the X Series 11 washing machine, an 11kg capacity model with an 'A-40 per cent' energy efficiency rating, using 40% less energy than standard A-rated machines. It features a Direct Motion Motor for quiet operation at 71dB, 15 programs, Smart Dosing, Smart AI Cycle, Smart Dual Spray, and Wi-Fi connectivity for smartphone control.

articles.title: Samsung to introduce AI-based commands for vernacular languages, India-specific features to drive AI appliances sale
articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.summary: Samsung is introducing AI-based commands for vernacular languages and India-specific features in its appliances to drive growth. The company is also launching 'Home Care Plus,' a customer service feature, and customized cooling solutions for air-conditioners in India. It's developing Tizen Lite to enable AI features like Bixby in mid-range appliances.

articles.title: I've driven the ultra fast-charging Zeekr 7X – and it shows Chinese EVs are still better at premium design than driving experiences
articles.author: Leon Poultney
articles.summary: Zeekr, backed by Geely Group, has launched the Zeekr 7X, a mid-sized SUV, to challenge the European market, competing with Tesla Model Y and others. The Zeekr 7X features 'Golden Battery' technology for unmatched range and charging speeds, a Qualcomm Snapdragon-powered digital cockpit, and advanced automated driving capabilities.

articles.title: Samsung Electronics joins coral reef restoration efforts with Galaxy smartphones
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Co. mentioned its Galaxy smartphones.

articles.title: Glow & Protect: Best Body Lotions with SPF for Sun Protection & Radiant Skin
articles.summary: Nivea Sun Lotion SPF 30 offers instant UVA/UVB protection. Other lotions, utilizing aloe vera and botanical ingredients, hydrate, protect, and soothe skin. A tan-removing lotion is powered by Glycoclear technology and SPF 30.

articles.title: Blendable Beauty: Achieve a Radiant Complexion with Liquid Blush
articles.summary: LoveChild Masaba launched Block Buster Blush, delivering a radiant, buildable, long-lasting, dewy matte finish. FAE Beauty introduced Liquid Lush Blush, offering a featherlight, buildable flush with a seamless, radiant finish. Typsy Beauty released Silk Cushion Blush, delivering a hydrating, buildable glow with a soft, matte finish. Gush launched Serum Infused Vegan Liquid Blush in Rare Cherry, a dewy, ultra-pigmented, blendable, and long-lasting blush. PAC introduced Spotlight Liquid Blush in Bubblegum, a high-pigment, dewy liquid blush for a buildable, long-lasting flush. These blushes are available on platforms like Amazon.

articles.title: We just dropped the price for these Microsoft Surface SE Laptops under $200
articles.author: Stack Commerce
articles.summary: Microsoft is offering the Surface SE laptop for $189.99 (regularly $378). The laptop features an Intel Celeron N4120 processor, 8GB of RAM, and 128GB of eMMC storage. It's designed as a lightweight and reliable option for users needing portability and strong battery life.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Likely To Launch Along With Motorola Razr 60 Flip Phone; Check Expected Specifications and Features
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Motorola is anticipated to launch the Motorola Edge 60, a mid-range smartphone for the Indian market, on April 24th alongside the Razr 60. The Edge 60 is expected to feature a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 processor, up to 12GB of RAM, a 6.7-inch curved pOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate, a 50MP Sony LYTIA 700C primary camera with OIS, and a 5,200mAh battery with 68W flash charging.

articles.title: Legend Internet goes public with NGX listing
articles.author: Taofik Salako
articles.summary: Legend Internet Plc is listing on the Nigerian Exchange (NGX). The company is expanding beyond broadband by introducing LegendMail, Nigeria's first email ecosystem with built-in payments, MailPay for sending/receiving money via email, MyLegend App for managing subscriptions, and Legend Pay, a digital payments platform.

articles.title: Roborock Rolls Out Spring Deals on Washer-Dryers via Naver Smart Store
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Roborock is launching its Zeo Series of all-in-one washer-dryers (H1, H1 Lite, and M1) during Naver's Spring Promotion from April 21 to May 6, 2025. The Zeo Series offers features like Zeo-cycle™ Moderate Temperature Drying Technology, RR Seafarer™ Intelligent Washing & Drying Algorithm, and Roborock LintClear™ Self-Cleaning System, along with multiple sterilization modes.

articles.title: Gemini Live's real-time screen sharing is now available to all Android users
articles.author: Vishnu Sarangapurkar
articles.summary: Google is expanding Gemini Live's real-time video and screen sharing support to all Android users. This feature, initially introduced on Pixel 9 and Galaxy S25 devices and for Gemini Advanced subscribers, allows users to interact with Gemini using their phone's screen or camera. Users can trigger 'Share screen with Live' option to enable Gemini to analyze what's on the screen and respond to queries.

articles.title: Bell reveals Ahlo, a new Canadian smartphone brand
articles.summary: Bell has launched a new smartphone brand called Ahlo, designed in Canada for value-conscious users. The Ahlo phone is now available for $270 outright or $1 per month at Bell or Virgin Plus.

articles.title: Hands on with the Bell Ahlo 1 smartphone
articles.summary: Bell has released a new smartphone under the brand Ahlo. The phone is available through Bell and Virgin Plus at a discounted rate with a two-year contract, or for a higher price outright. The Ahlo 1 is a low-cost device with a 5,000 mAh battery and a serviceable screen, targeting customers seeking the cheapest available option.

articles.title: Why I pre-ordered a Nintendo Switch 2 despite the outdated tech - Reader's Feature
articles.author: Game Central
articles.summary: Nintendo is preparing to launch the Nintendo Switch 2. Despite concerns about outdated hardware and pricing, the announcement has convinced some to pre-order. The author notes limitations of the original Switch, particularly compared to devices like the Steam Deck and Asus ROG Ally X, while anticipating improvements in the new model.

articles.title: GS25 Leverages 'Search Failures' to Discover Hidden Demand for Alcohol Products
articles.author: Korea Bizwire
articles.summary: GS25 utilizes 'search failure' data from its mobile app, Our Neighborhood GS, to identify and launch new alcoholic beverages. Recent successful product launches include Cheongmyeongju, a Korean rice wine, and Château d'Esclans Whispering Angel rosé wine, identified through analysis of search failures and social media trends.

articles.title: 36 Unconventional Products That Could Have A Big Impact On Your 2025
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article presents a collection of new products and services from various companies and small businesses. These include the NeeDoh "Dream Drop" fidget toy by Schylling, 'floating' air conduction headphones by Purity, Wititude's 2025 Day-to-Day Calendar, a snap-on pasta strainer by Kitchen Gizmos, and a polar bear hydrating eye stick, along with many other items. Each product is designed to enhance everyday life through convenience, entertainment, or personal care.

articles.title: Humanoid workers and surveillance buggies: ‘embodied AI' is reshaping daily life in China
articles.author: Amy Hawkins
articles.summary: Meituan is utilizing food delivery drones in Shenzhen to deliver orders, aiming to reduce delivery times. Unitree showcased its humanoid robots at the Spring Festival Gala. Baidu operates Apollo Go robotaxis in select Chinese cities, while DeepSeek's R1 model is helping domestic humanoid robotics companies.

articles.title: 9 new Delaware restaurants offer everything from ramen \u0026 dumplings to pretzels \u0026 chicken
articles.author: Delaware Online
articles.summary: Nan Xiang Soup Dumplings, a chain founded in Flushing, New York, is launching a new location in the Stanton area of Delaware. The restaurant aims to bring authentic ramen noodles and dumplings to the First State of Delaware.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra Price Slashed In New Easter Deal
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Samsung is offering a major new deal on the Galaxy S25 Ultra.

articles.title: Handyman in Fresno, CA: LintFree Dryer Vent Cleaning Delivers Same-Day Solutions
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: LintFree Dryer Vent Cleaning now offers residents general home repair services, expanding beyond its dryer vent cleaning services. This provides a wide range of repair and maintenance solutions.

articles.title: Iconic South Philly Treat Lands on North Wildwood Boardwalk
articles.author: Eddie Davis
articles.summary: John's Water Ice, a South Philly-based company, is opening a new store on the Boardwalk in North Wildwood this summer. This will be the fifth shop for the company, and it also plans to open two new locations in Philadelphia in 2025. The store will offer John's Water Ice, known for its cherry, lemon, pineapple, and chocolate flavors.

articles.title: SketchBubble Launches Free AI Presentation Maker to Revolutionize Slide Creation
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: SketchBubble launched its new Free AI Presentation Maker. This innovative tool is designed to empower users to create high-quality presentations quickly and easily, without needing design skills.

articles.title: With Bespoke AI vision, Bixby grasps natural reaction: Samsung's Deokho Kim
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Samsung is introducing smart appliances like refrigerators that function as Wi-Fi hubs and air conditioners that synchronize with fans for optimal cooling. These appliances are integrated with Samsung's Bixby platform, differentiating them through device control capabilities.
